instructions: From any Home screen, tap Messages . Tap the Compose icon. Tap the Contacts icon. Drop down and tap Groups . Tap the group you want to send the message to. Tap Select all or manually select recipients. Tap Done . Enter message text in the Group conversation box. When done, tap the Send icon.

From any Home screen, tap Messages . Tap the Compose icon. Enter message recipient or choose from Contacts . Enter message text in the Enter message field. Tap the Attach icon (paper clip). To take a picture and send it in the message: Tap Take picture . Frame the subject. Tap the Shutter icon. Tap Save to have the picture inserted in the message. Tap the Send icon when ready to send. To record a video and send it in the message: Tap Record video. Tap the Camcorder icon. Tap the Stop icon to stop recording. Tap Save to have the video inserted in the message. Tap the Send icon when ready to send.
Tap Take picture . Frame the subject. Tap the Shutter icon. Tap Save to have the picture inserted in the message. Tap the Send icon when ready to send.
Tap Record video. Tap the Camcorder icon. Tap the Stop icon to stop recording. Tap Save to have the video inserted in the message. Tap the Send icon when ready to send.

From any Home screen, tap Messages . Tap the Compose icon. Enter message recipient or choose from Contacts. Enter message text in the Enter message field. Tap the Attach icon (paper clip). Tap Image or Video . Tap one of these options: Dropbox Gallery Photos Samsung Link Tap Always or Just once . Tap the folder of the image or video. Tap the desired image or video to select the check box. Tap Done . Tap the Send icon.

Image titled Delete Yahoo Email Step 9 1 Open Yahoo Mail. Tap the Yahoo Mail app icon, which resembles a white envelope on a purple background. This will open your Yahoo Mail inbox if you're logged in. If you aren't logged into your account, enter your email address and password when prompted before proceeding. Image titled Delete Yahoo Email Step 10 2 Long-press an email. Doing so will prompt a checkmark to appear to the left of the email after about a second. Unfortunately, you cannot clear your entire inbox at once on mobile. Image titled Delete Yahoo Email Step 11 3 Select other emails for deletion. Tap every email that you want to delete. A checkmark will appear to the left of each email you tap. Image titled Delete Yahoo Email Step 12 4 Tap the "Delete" Image titled Android7delete.png icon. It's a trash can-shaped icon at the bottom of the screen. The selected emails will be moved into the Trash folder. Image titled Delete Yahoo Email Step 13 5 Tap . This is in the upper-left side of the screen. A pop-out menu will appear on the left side of the screen. On Android, the icon is on the left side of the search bar that's at the top of the screen. Image titled Delete Yahoo Email Step 14 6 Scroll down to the "Trash" heading. You'll find it in the middle of the pop-out menu. Image titled Delete Yahoo Email Step 15 7 Tap the "Trash" Image titled Android7delete.png icon. It's to the right of the "Trash" heading. Image titled Delete Yahoo Email Step 16 8 Tap when prompted. Doing so empties the Trash folder, thus removing permanently the emails from your account. Advertisement
